original:
A person who does not have their needs met, often referred to as a "needy" individual, may struggle to function effectively within society. According to scholars Gough and Doyal, every individual has a fundamental interest in avoiding significant harm that impedes their ability to pursue their vision of a good life, regardless of how that vision is defined.
